name: Fitness & Workout App
description: Complete workout tracking, meal planning, and fitness progress app

issues.title: Build workout library and exercise database
issues.body:
## Description
Create comprehensive exercise database with instructions and videos.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Exercise catalog
- [ ] Muscle group categorization
- [ ] Difficulty levels
- [ ] Equipment requirements
- [ ] Video demonstrations

issues.title: Create workout builder and planner
issues.body:
## Description
Allow users to create custom workout routines.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Drag-and-drop builder
- [ ] Pre-made templates
- [ ] Rest periods
- [ ] Sets and reps
- [ ] Save custom workouts

issues.title: Implement workout logging and tracking
issues.body:
## Description
Track completed workouts with weights and reps.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Log exercises
- [ ] Track weights/reps
- [ ] Timer functionality
- [ ] Rest timer
- [ ] Workout history

issues.title: Add nutrition tracking and meal logging
issues.body:
## Description
Track daily nutrition intake and macros.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Food database
- [ ] Barcode scanning
- [ ] Macro tracking
- [ ] Calorie counting
- [ ] Meal history

issues.title: Build user profile and goal setting
issues.body:
## Description
User profiles with fitness goals.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Profile creation
- [ ] Body measurements
- [ ] Goal setting
- [ ] Progress photos
- [ ] Personal records

issues.title: Create progress tracking and analytics
issues.body:
## Description
Visualize fitness progress over time.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Weight charts
- [ ] Strength progression
- [ ] Body measurements
- [ ] Workout streaks
- [ ] Achievement badges

issues.title: Implement social features and sharing
issues.body:
## Description
Share workouts and progress with friends.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Follow users
- [ ] Share workouts
- [ ] Activity feed
- [ ] Workout challenges
- [ ] Comments and likes

issues.title: Add workout reminders and notifications
issues.body:
## Description
Remind users to stay consistent.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Scheduled reminders
- [ ] Rest day alerts
- [ ] Streak notifications
- [ ] Goal milestones
- [ ] Motivational messages

issues.title: Build meal planning and recipes
issues.body:
## Description
Meal planning tools with recipes.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Weekly meal planner
- [ ] Recipe database
- [ ] Grocery lists
- [ ] Macro-based suggestions
- [ ] Dietary preferences

issues.title: Add personal trainer features
issues.body:
## Description
Tools for trainers to manage clients.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Client management
- [ ] Assign workouts
- [ ] Track client progress
- [ ] In-app messaging
- [ ] Payment integration

issues.title: Implement AI workout recommendations
issues.body:
## Description
Personalized workout suggestions.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Algorithm based on goals
- [ ] Progressive overload
- [ ] Recovery suggestions
- [ ] Exercise alternatives
- [ ] Adaptive difficulty
